title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 304.2 - Food
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 304.2 - Food

State Regulations

Incarcerated individuals confined in a special housing unit, residential rehabilitation unit or step-down unit will be provided meals of the same
type as the meals available to incarcerated individuals in general population and in
sufficient quantity to be nutritionally adequate, except as provided in this
section. (a) All food items will be
delivered to the incarcerated individuals upon receipt from the food service area, and in a manner that will ensure receipt of the food in an appropriate
condition. (b) Repealed
(c) Repealed
(d) Repealed
(e) Repealed
(f) Repealed

Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
